name: Jumping
description: Jumping exercises to improve agility and reflexes.

workouts.name: Basic Jumping Drills
workouts.description: Perform basic jumping drills for 5 minutes.

workouts.name: Intermediate Jumping Drills
workouts.description: Perform intermediate jumping drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Advanced Jumping Drills
workouts.description: Perform advanced jumping drills for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Jumping with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform jumping drills with resistance bands for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Precision Jumping Drills
workouts.description: Perform precision jumping drills for 10 minutes.

workouts.name: Jumping with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform jumping drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Jumping with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform jumping drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Jumping Drills with Sparring
workouts.description: Perform weighted vest jumping drills with sparring for 15 minutes.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Jumping Drills with Sparring and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform weighted vest jumping drills with sparring and resistance bands for 15 minutes.
